decision_conditions: The submitted proposed plans and elevations do not accurately represent the proposed set in from the boundary with the neighbouring property at 127 Surbiton Hill Park. Due to the submission of inaccurate plans, Officers are unable to fully assess the impact of the proposed development on the character and appearance of the property or the wider area and on the residential amenities of neighbouring properties. The applicant has therefore failed to demonstrate, through the submission of accurate and consistent drawings, that the proposed development would not have an unacceptable adverse impact on the residential amenities of adjoining neighbouring properties, or the character and appearance of the existing property or the wider area, in conflict with the Paragraph 124 of the NPPF (2021), Policy D3 of the London Plan (2021) as well as Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Kingston Core Strategy (2012).
description: Erection of single storey side and rear extension, new outbuilding to rear and hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions and installation of 1no. rooflight to front roofslope
